Detailed Description

Layer address handling helper function.

This class helps to make the layer addressing more generic. The type definition for L2, and L3 addresses should be used for address definitions to simplify the switching to other types.

Both types (LAddress::L2Type, LAddress::L3Type) will be used as keys in in STL containers.

Definition at line 40 of file SimpleAddress.h.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef long LAddress::L2Type

Type definition for a L2 (MAC) address.

The type should support initialization with long/string values and casting to long/double. The type should be also support the ==,<, and > operators.

Definition at line 50 of file SimpleAddress.h.

typedef long LAddress::L3Type

Type definition for a L3 (Network) address.

The type should support initialization with long values and casting to long/double. The type should be also support the ==,<, and > operators.
